timeline.bodyText: Merge with comment above, it looks very weird floating by itself here
timeline.author: tivervac

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, for some reason the default formatting length for comments is 80 chars. We've changed it to 120 in our codebase, same as for java lines.
Not sure why you'd want a different allowed length for your comments than for your code
replies.author: tivervac
